SQL.LOAD_FILE_LINE: INSERT INTO ELP_Upload_File_Lines (file_line, line_number, upload_type) values (:file_line, :line_number, :upload_type)
SQL.UPDATE_FILE_PROCESSED: update ELP_Upload_File_PROCESSED set process_status = :process_status where upload_type = :upload_type and filename = :filename
SQL.LOAD_PROCESSING_ERR: SELECT Record_Number, Error_Message FROM ELP_Upload_File_Errors where upload_type = ':upload_type' order by Message_Date
